title: Family of Native American woman missing since 2021 seeks closure, attorney says
description: Preston Henry Tolth was indicted on assault and carjacking charges in connection with the disappearance of Ella Mae Begay, a Native American woman missing since 2021.

title: Judge issues ruling in major challenge to abortion medication
description: A federal judge in Texas has issued a ruling in a challenge to the abortion drug mifepristone

title: Nearly 2,000 volunteers help search for missing Minnesota mother
description: Nearly 2,000 volunteers turned out on Friday to help search rural terrain for any clues in the disappearance of Minnesota mother Madeline Kingsbury, police said.

title: How startup CEO was accused of $175M fraud while denying she made up her success
description: Criminal fraud charges were unsealed this week against Charlie Javice, formerly CEO of the student loan assistance platform Frank.

title: Classified Ukraine documents were first posted on the web in early March
description: Classified Ukraine documents were first posted on the web in early March raising new security concerns

title: Biden administration to speed up asylum cases
description: The Biden administration next week will begin conducting asylum interviews at the border and expanding legal resources.

title: Taliban prevents women from working at UN in Afghanistan
description: The Taliban banned Afghan women from working at the United Nations in Afghanistan on Tuesday, adding another restriction the Taliban has imposed on women.

title: Tennessee House ousts 2 Democratic lawmakers: What's next
description: What's next for Tennessee and the two ousted lawmakers?

title: Ex-Theranos executive headed to prison after losing appeal
description: Former Theranos executive Ramesh “Sunny” Balwani will be heading to prison later this month

title: US probes crash involving Tesla that hit student leaving bus
description: U.S. road safety regulators have sent a team to investigate a crash involving a Tesla that may have been using a partially automated driving system when it struck a student who had just exited a school bus

title: To free American journalist jailed in Russia, US faces uphill battle: Experts
description: The U.S. faces an uphill battle freeing detained Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich

title: Tennessee lawmaker expulsions: Has this happened before?
description: Tennessee lawmaker expulsions: has this happened before?

title: Paul Cattermole of UK pop group S Club 7 dies at 46
description: Paul Cattermole, a member of early-2000s British pop group S Club 7, has died at the age of 46

title: FAA says leaky faucets are a safety problem on Boeing 787s
description: Boeing has had several production problems with its 787 Dreamliner planes over the last couple of years, and now you can add leaky lavatory faucets to the list

title: Save the date: One year until total solar eclipse sweeps US
description: Just one year from now, a total solar eclipse will sweep across North America

title: WATCH:  Grandfather has best reaction when grandson pays him surprise visit
description: Tiffany German recorded her husband Michael's reaction when he got an unexpected visit from his grandson MJ.

title: California lawmaker wants Peeps to change its ingredients
description: A bill in the California Legislature would ban five chemicals found in some of the most popular candy in the U.S. The bill by Assemblymember Jesse Gabriel would ban chemicals found in candy like Skittles, Starbursts and Peeps

title: Pope Francis to miss Way of the Cross event in cold Rome
description: The Vatican says Pope Francis won’t go to the Colosseum for the traditional Good Friday Way of the Cross procession

title: Fire official: 11 hurt in Detroit apartment building fire
description: About a dozen people have been hurt in an early morning apartment building fire on Detroit’s west side

title: Tesla cuts prices on all models, 3rd cut this year
description: Tesla cut prices on its entire U.S. electric vehicle model lineup for the third time this year in an apparent effort to lure more buyers amid rising interest rates

title: 20 hurt when inmate sets fire at NYC's Rikers Island jail
description: Authorities say 20 people were injured in a fire set by an inmate at New York City’s troubled Rikers Island jail complex

title: 2 arrested in murders of 3 teens, 3rd suspect at large
description: Two juveniles are in custody in connection with the murders of three teenagers. The third suspect, also a juvenile, remains at large.

title: US adds a healthy 236,000 jobs despite Fed's rate hikes
description: America’s employers added a solid 236,000 jobs in March, reflecting a resilient labor market and suggesting that the Federal Reserve may see the need to keep raising interest rates in the coming months

title: 1st ocean fish farm proposed for East Coast off New England
description: A group of fish farmers wants to be the first to bring offshore aquaculture to the waters off New England by growing salmon and trout miles from land

title: UK police charge 12-year-old with murder in car crash death
description: British police have charged a 12-year-old boy with murder after a car plowed into a woman on a city street in northern England

title: US authorities charge man in case of missing Navajo woman
description: A New Mexico man is scheduled to be arraigned on assault and carjacking charges in connection with the 2021 disappearance of a Native American woman

title: WATCH:  Toy maker creates lifelike pet plushies for grieving owners
description: This toy maker has helped thousands of animal lovers cope with the grief of losing their pet by offering a service to create realistic replicas of them.
